title: Fix the bugs
text: I like the concept of the app but there are some bugs they need to fix. First when I try to connect my rapid led Corona fixture the app shuts me out during the connections process and I am unable to connect my light. Second when I try to log my parameters the save button doesn’t work.

title: App not working with Rapid LEDs
text: App is spotty at best and requires several me to reset the rapid leds several times before the times are able to work. At this time I would not recommend fishbit app products as the app doesn’t really work.

title: Love it
text: For a new aquarium owner such as myself, this makes the process much easier and I am already looking forward to expanding the types of aquatic life in my small but growing collection. Everything from initial setup to navigating the app is incredibly intuitive. No doubt the best part is how intelligent I sound when talking about my tank to others. Well played, Fishbit.

title: Beautiful app, makes my life easier
text: I’m so glad I found this app. I was using an Excel spreadsheet to track everything before and this has really helped me stay on top of tracking my parameters. I found the app to be well designed and the interface to be intuitive. Highly recommend.

title: Easy to use and visually appealing too
text: Hands down the easiest experience I've had in setting up automated programs for my lights. I've only used the manual and sun cycle settings so hoping geo location works just as well. Great design also, love the coral in the background. Nice touch!

title: Easy to use
text: Been using Fishbit to track my levels and its a breeze and really simple to use. Way better than writing everything down in my notebook.

title: Very handy
text: I have a 50 gallon tank and I found this app to be very useful. User friendly interface makes for an excellent overall experience. Highly recommend

title: Great user experience
text: Fishbit is very intuitive and makes it easy to control and monitor my fish tank. The alerts are easy to customize and not intrusive. Highly recommend

title: Thank you fish bit!!
text:
Has single handedly  saved my fish tank on multiple accounts! Thank you fishbit!

I'm excited to see what you guys have in store for us next!

title: Best aquarium journal!
text: Hands down the best app for keeping track of your aquarium parameters, and setting reminders. Can't wait to get my Fishbit monitor and controller!

title: Thanks fishbit
text: A beautifully made app that's easy to set up and use! Very eager to see what's coming next.

title: Intuitive interface! Great App
text: Interface looks and feels seamless! Excellent.

title: Awesome App!!!!!
text: Awesome app! Completely changed the fish tank game and made my life so much easier. Love it

title: Phenomenal
text: Aspiring to have my tank look like the background pic of the app...

title: Junk
text: Don’t bother. Waste of time. Keeps crashing.

title: Scam
text: Pledged on Kickstarter and product was never delivered.  Don't trust this company.
